column4: hello. I am setting up a wireless network for my house. Since I don't wan't intruder's, I am using MAC identification. When I type in iwconfig in the terminal, is the entry after Access Point my wireless card's MAC ID
I use openvpn over wireless, and I discard non-openvpn packets over the link
erUSUL :Before I triy all that. Does WEP encryption work with wifi-radar, I remember having issues with wep in network-manager, so I am reluctant to use it.
